comments: This is a tough course and tough professor, but a fair one. You always know where you stand. If you do your part she will meet you half way. If you think you can blow off reading and classes, you picked the wrong instructor!! She knows her stuff and she\'s great at what she does. Only slackers have a problem with her!

She is horrible!! do not recommend taking this class with her. I took it online. I was an accelerated course so it was a lot of work. But if for some reason you need some help or an emergency happens and you need more time to submit your work, she will not help!!
She is tough cookie, if you want an A, you better be a real student, don\'t take her lightly.

This professor is by far THE WORST professor I\'ve ever had in my life she looses your papers and hold you responsible to resubmit them as in her course is your only course and you don\'t have a life . She complains about lateness but was always late to the classes we had she didn\'t know how to use blackboard and held us liable for her tactfulness . She knows her work and could be a good professor if shed stop trying to be a lawyer in a Business class. Horrible if your signed up drop it ASAP!
This professor is very unfair and inconsistent.

This is the worst professor ever. She has no idea what she is doing. She loses homework and blames it on the students. She made my semester so frustrating.I do not know what my grade for her class is, because as usual, she is late in grading assignments. There is not enough space here to list how I feel about this professor\'s teaching style.

She is a tough cookie and her test are hard. You should stay on top of the reading all semester because if you wait to study the night before a test you will be screwed. Her passing grade is a 70 and her test are long and hard. She is a pretty cool professor overall.

She is the worst professor in the business dept. I passed both midterm and finals with B+ and she gave me a C+ for a final grade. She doesn\'t care for her students and doesn\'t care to fail anyone. Pathetice professor don\'t waste your time.

This must be the worst professor in the Business Dept. I believe she was known as Professor Pina. I got an 85 on my midterm and she gave me a C+ as a final grade. All she does is speak of her personal life. Please stay away.
